itinerary.mapNote: From Auronzo hut. Tre Cime di Lavaredo circuit. 2405m.
Below Monte Antelao 3264m — 'King of the Cadore'. 1796m.
Titian's birthplace. Trail end in Cadore valley. 879m.

waypoints.name: Tre Cime di Lavaredo
waypoints.note: Three iconic dolomite pillars. Most photographed in Alps.

waypoints.name: Monte Antelao
waypoints.note: 'King of the Cadore'. Second highest Dolomite peak.

waypoints.name: Lago di Misurina
waypoints.note: Reflection lake with Tre Cime. Most photographed lake view.

waypoints.name: Lago Sorapiss
waypoints.note: Milky turquoise glacial lake. Hidden gem of Cadore.

waypoints.name: Forcella del Lagazuoi
waypoints.note: WWI tunnels and museum. Dramatic via ferrata option.
